title: Global refunds if Supreme Court strikes down Trump tariffs
shortDescription: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent says the U.S. would have to provide refunds if the Supreme Court rules against President Donald Trump on tariffs.

title: Trump fails to overturn E. Jean Carroll's $83.3 million verdict
shortDescription: The same court upheld Carroll's separate $5 million jury verdict against Trump in from 2023 for a similar defamation and for sexual assault.

title: Trump asks Supreme Court to ok cuts to foreign aid passed by Congress
shortDescription: In an emergency appeal, the Justice Department asked the Supreme Court to block a lower court's ruling that the foreign aid must be spent.

title: Trump booed at US open. He is the first president to attend since 2000
shortDescription: Donald Trump attended the US Open on Sept. 7 for the men's final. He was booed and cheered by spectators, like other sport tournaments he's attended.

title: Joni Ernst is out of Iowa's Senate race. Here's what it means for 2026
shortDescription: U.S. Sen. Joni Ernst's decision not to run for reelection has reset the Republican field, spurring U.S. Rep. Ashley Hinson to jump into the race.

title: Man accused of plotting to assassinate Donald Trump goes on trial
shortDescription: Jury selection has begun in the case of Ryan Routh, the man accused of plotting to assassinate President Donald Trump.

title: Trump defends Chicago military threat
shortDescription: Donald Trump defends military threats to Chicago, sparking backlash from officials and residents.

title: Daily Briefing: Trump's Chicago threat
shortDescription: Trump warns troops could be headed for the Windy City. Here is the news to know on Monday.

title: As Boston's mayor faces Patriots heir, Trump looms large
shortDescription: The heir to a legendary football dynasty is facing off against a beloved incumbent in Boston’s Sept. 9 mayoral primary.

title: Amy Coney Barrett says 'I'm nobody's justice.' That includes Trump.
shortDescription: In an exclusive interview, Amy Coney Barrett discusses how she became a swing vote – to MAGA's dismay.

title: Barrett speaks on Trump, Supreme Court tensions
shortDescription: Supreme Court Justice Amy Coney Barrett, in a rare USA TODAY interview, discussed Trump rulings, Court tensions and efforts to restore public trust.

title: Trump to meet with European leaders, talk to Putin 'soon' about Ukraine
shortDescription: Trump said he would meet Sept. 8 or Sept. 9 with unspecified European leaders to discuss how to end Russia's war with Ukraine.

title: Trump administration says Abrego Garcia faces deportation to Eswatini
shortDescription: A U.S. Department of Homeland Security official said the change was made because Abrego Garcia stated that he fears persecution or torture in Uganda.

title: Crowd reacts as Trump arrives at US Open
shortDescription: President Donald Trump was greeted by the crowd as he arrived at the men's final match of the U.S. Open.

title: This Kennedy heir is making moves to take on RFK Jr. in Congress
shortDescription: Jack Schlossberg, a young voice in Democratic party, has gone viral on social media for his pop culture posts and attacks on RFK Jr.

title: Epstein files: 'We have the votes' to force release, congressman says
shortDescription: A bipartisan congressional team is optimistic it can force the Justice Department to release its files on convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.

title: 'Despicable': GOP senator lashes JD Vance over drug boat comments
shortDescription: The vice president and a Republican senator clashed over a U.S. military strike that killed 11 people on an alleged drug boat in the Caribbean.

title: Senior activists protesting Trump say 'We're not dead yet'
shortDescription: A top Trump aide said senior activists 'should go home and take a nap.' These progressive elders say they'll keep taking to the streets.

title: Barack Obama, Jimmy Carter...Donald Trump? Trump talks up Nobel Prize
shortDescription: President Trump's peacemaking efforts in Gaza and Ukraine have stalled, even as he and his supporters talk up a Nobel Peace Prize.

title: Trump threatens 'WAR' in Chicago immigration enforcement: What to know
shortDescription: Trump invoked war imagery in threatening to deploy the National Guard to Chicago, where Gov. JB Pritzker opposes having troops.
